name: Moku (Dehayat, dzezabel)
description:
How to play:

You have four possible actions:

1. charge (obtain 1 bullet)

2. shoot (use 1 bullet)

3. shield (protect yourself from bullets)

4. bomb [ usable only after 5 charges without shooting beforehand ] (use a bomb)

The goal is to beat your opponent by shooting them or by using a bomb. 

You can use an avatar of your choice, customize it and play with friends! And if you win - you get to taunt them with incredibly annoying "mocks"! 

You can play it in the browser on your computer or mobile phone.

Tip: it needs two players to play simultaneously. 

Made by:

Mohammad Aldehayat (Programmer)

Anja Kolundzija (Artist)
